attributes.action: Disabled Changing Facilities for Adults and Children with complex needs in Public Places
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to try and get as many people as possible to agree that there should be changing facilities that benefit adults and children who have complex needs.
These facilities should include;- Tracking Hoist, Adjustable shower/changing bed, shower, toilet, sink.
This would let these people keep their dignity and feel like they belong instead of having to be changed on floors in toilets, outside on the grass or even in the back of their own vehicle. Lets get our voices heard on their behalf!
